```{r}
library(ggplot2) 
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

library(readxl)
library(RColorBrewer)

```
 
 
#Now design your own palette and try it out! 
Design the best palette you can and send them to Li. 
You should probably make one just for discrete variables and don't worry about making one for continuous variables.  

Check:
Are the colors easily discernable? 
Is the palette colorblind friendly? 



No keys for this lesson. There is no single correct or best answer.
